text: â€œIzvi ndizvo zviyero zvearitari mumakubhiti marefu, kubhiti riri kubhiti43:13 kubhiti raiva 0.5 yemita noupamhi hwechanza43:13 masendimita angaita 8: Chigadziko chayo chakadzika kubhiti rimwe chete nekubhiti rimwe chete paupamhi, nomuromo uno upamhi hwechanza43:13 masendimita angaita 23  pamusoro.
